titleStmt.title: The case of the Kersey-clothiers inhabiting within the parishes of Hallifax, Bradford, Bingley, Kighley, and other adjacent towns and parishes within the west-riding of the county of York, against the aulnagers: Humbly offered to the honourable House of Commons in Parliament assembled.

The case of the Kersey-clothiers inhabiting within the parishes of Hallifax, Bradford, Bingley, Kighley, and other adjacent towns and parishes within the west-riding of the county of York, against the aulnagers: Humbly offered to the honourable House of Commons in Parliament assembled.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
